s1.ptxt: Check evaporator fins for blockage. If found clogged, use compressed air to clean the fins.

item.ptxt: Do not use water for cleaning of evaporator.

Be careful not to damage evaporator fins. If evaporator fin is bent, straighten it by using a screwdriver or pair of pliers. If any leakage is found from fitting or tube, repair or replace evaporator.

s1.ptxt: Check inlet and outlet fittings for crack or scratch. Repair them as required.
